title: Hextech repair tool shows way less ping than I usually get ingame
body:
Is this normal? It says i average 30ping, which is what I averaged a few weeks back, but something happened and now I get 58 ping lowest, with lagspikes. 
Does everyone get lower ping on the repair tool or is it just me? And is there a way to get 30ms on league too ?

replies.body: I get lower ping on that thing too.

You can get a really good overview of your routing through [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)!  Just make sure to route to the EUW server: 192.64.170.252.

If you find any snags in your local network, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your network to the game server.  I hope that helps!
